mat itppext::ltr_mat ( vec  v  ) 

Returns a lower triangular matrix where the elements are taken from the argument vector in row-major order.

Parameters:
v A vector of N(N+1)/2 lower triangular elements
Returns:
A NxN lower triangular matrix
See also:

vec itppext::ltr_vec ( mat  M  ) 

Returns the lower triangular elements (including diagonal) of a matrix, in row-major order.

Parameters:
M An NxN square matrix
Returns:
The vector of N(N+1)/2 lower triangular elements of M
See also:

void itppext::normalise ( mat &  X,
vec &  Xmean,
vec &  Xcovdiag 
)

Normalises a data set comprising a set of inputs X and a set of outputs y. The X and y arguments are overridden by their normalised versions. The mean and covariance of the original dataset are also returned.

String tokeniser - split a string into a vector of substring identified by a delimiter (space by default). Optionally, stop after a certain number of tokens has been found and return the rest of the string as the last token
